actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare Program.
short_title: Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009

summary.text: Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare program.

titles.title: Medicare Hearing Enhancement and Auditory Rehabilitation (HEAR) Act of 2009
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover hearing aids and auditory rehabilitation services under the Medicare Program.
